donor_name: Kuwait Fund for Arab Economic Development
project_name: South Eastern University of Sri Lanka Development Project - Phase 1B
objectives: Develop the essential academic infrastructure and introduce new demand driven degree Programs at the South Eastern University of Sri Lanka to reflect regional and national needs of the country and thereby support and social and economic development in Sri Lanka.
main_components: Students Hostel; Accommodation for staff; Auditorium; Extension to the faculty of Technology  Building; Supply and installation of furniture, Education & IT Equipment
